column1: #  - CONV_# : G=1 & ALL VALUES MUST BE LARGER THAN ZERO
#  - GROUP_#: G>1 & 'C' AND 'K' MUST BOTH BE DIVISIBLE BY 'G'
#  - MAC : SKIPPED BECAUSE DEGREES ARE ALL 1
#  - LEVELS MUST BE WRITTEN IN ORDER FROM 'S0' TO 'S2'.
#  - A LEVEL WITH ALL 1 DEGREES CAN BE IGNORED.
#  - PARSING ALGORITHM IS NOT SMART. PLEASE BE CAREFUL TYPOS.
